name: Not my last day!
description:
Get ready to witness the ultimate showdown of feathered speedsters in the most outrageous racing game ever created!

Announcing the alpha version launch of our indie video game, "Not my last day!" It's a parody racing game where you take control of a chicken and compete against other feathered friends to see who can cross the finish line first.

Experience the thrill of high-speed racing on various tracks, each with its unique challenges and obstacles. Dodge obstacles and master drifts to gain an edge over your opponents.

With its cartoonish graphics and hilarious sound effects, Not my last day! promises to deliver a racing experience like no other. You'll be laughing out loud as you watch your opponents flap their wings and try to keep up with your chicken's lightning-fast speed.

But don't let the game's humor fool you. "Not my last day!" is a challenging racing game that requires skill and strategy to master. With multiple difficulty levels, you can start as a novice racer and work your way up to become the ultimate chicken champion.

So, get ready to join the chicken race and become the fastest fowl on the track.
